name: Frank Was Alive
description:
WebGL build is rendering differently, download for the true FWA experience!

Made for Ludum Dare 46 by Joeri Ridder and Leon van Oldenborgh.

Frank could use a hand.

In the dead of night, Frankensteins Monster got out of his creator's castle and fell into a hole. During this unfortunate event he got dismembered and lost his head. By a stroke of luck he's still alive.  Control the limbs of monster Frank to move about and search the cave for his lost head. Be careful not to pull too hard though, you might rip them off! 

Controls

  • Mouse: Pick up and drag limbs.
  • ESC: Restart or Quit.

Mac build doesn't work yet, we're working on it :)
